summary: This very simple mod increases the amount of radiant quests you must do in the Companions before it forces you to advance.
descriptionHtml:
This very simple mod increases the amount of radiant quests you must do in the Companions before it forces you to advance. 

I thought it was pretty lame that the Companions quest line, unlike the other factions, forces you to do the next story quest after you do the required radiant quests. It felt like I was being rushed through the whole thing WAY too quickly.

The vanilla amount is 1 quest before Proving Honor, 1 before The Silver Hand, and 2 before Blood\'s Honor. The new requirements are 3 before Proving Honor, 4 before The Silver Hand, and 5 before Blood\'s Honor.

Note: I know this works if you load it up with a new game, but I\'m not sure what will happen if it loaded in the middle of one. The values I changed are, for some reason (blame bethesda...), associated with the script for the quest in which you see Aela and crew fighting the giant, and I\'m not sure if the game will update them if you\'ve already started this quest. Any feedback on this issue would be appreciated. :)
author: Yorimi
